00019 /*
00020   This file contains classes corresponding to window layouts
00021   defined in resources/mygui/ *.xml.
00022 
00023   Each class inherites GUI::Layout and loads the XML file, and
00024   provides some helper functions to manipulate the elements of the
00025   window.
00026 
00027   The windows are never created or destroyed (except at startup and
00028   shutdown), they are only hid. You can control visibility with
00029   setVisible().
00030  */
00031

00116   class InventoryWindow : public OEngine::GUI::Layout
00117   {
00118   public:
00119     enum CategoryMode
00120       {
00121         CM_All = 0,      // All items
00122         CM_Weapon = 1,   // Only weapons
00123         CM_Apparel = 2,  // Apparel
00124         CM_Magic = 3,    // Magic
00125         CM_Misc = 4      // Misc
00126       };
00127 
00128     InventoryWindow ()
00129       : Layout("openmw_inventory_window_layout.xml")
00130       , categoryMode(CM_All)
00131 
00132       // color should be fetched from skin
00133       , activeColor(0, 0, 1)
00134       , inactiveColor(0.7, 0.7, 0.7)
00135     {
00136       setCoord(0, 200, 600, 400);
00137 
00138       // These are just demo values, you should replace these with
00139       // real calls from outside the class later.
00140 
00141       mMainWidget->setCaption("Glass Frostsword");
00142       setText("EncumbranceBarT", "176/210");
00143 
00144       MyGUI::ProgressPtr pt;
00145       getWidget(pt, "EncumbranceBar");
00146       pt->setProgressRange(210);
00147       pt->setProgressPosition(176);
00148 
00149       MyGUI::WidgetPtr avatar;
00150       getWidget(avatar, "Avatar");
00151 
00152       // Adjust armor rating text to bottom of avatar widget
00153       MyGUI::TextBox* armor_rating;
00154       getWidget(armor_rating, "ArmorRating");
00155       armor_rating->setCaption("Armor: 11");
00156       MyGUI::IntCoord coord = armor_rating->getCoord();
00157       coord.top = avatar->getCoord().height - 4 - coord.height;
00158       armor_rating->setCoord(coord);
00159 
00160       names[0] = "All";
00161       names[1] = "Weapon";
00162       names[2] = "Apparel";
00163       names[3] = "Magic";
00164       names[4] = "Misc";
00165 
00166       boost::array<CategoryMode, 5> categories = { {
00167         CM_All, CM_Weapon, CM_Apparel, CM_Magic, CM_Misc
00168       } };
00169 
00170       // Initialize buttons with text and adjust sizes, also mark All as active button
00171       int margin = 2;
00172       int last_x = 0;
00173       for (int i = 0; i < categories.size(); ++i)
00174       {
00175           CategoryMode mode = categories[i];
00176           std::string name = names[mode];
00177           name += "Button";
00178           setText(name, names[mode]);
00179           getWidget(buttons[mode], name);
00180 
00181           MyGUI::ButtonPtr &button_pt = buttons[mode];
00182           if (mode == CM_All)
00183               button_pt->setTextColour(activeColor);
00184           else
00185               button_pt->setTextColour(inactiveColor);
00186           MyGUI::IntCoord coord = button_pt->getCoord();
00187           coord.left = last_x;
00188           last_x += coord.width + margin;
00189           button_pt->setCoord(coord);
00190 
00191           button_pt->eventMouseButtonClick += MyGUI::newDelegate(this, &InventoryWindow::onCategorySelected);
00192       }
00193     }
00194 
00195     void setCategory(CategoryMode mode)
00196     {
00197         MyGUI::ButtonPtr pt = getCategoryButton(categoryMode);
00198         pt->setTextColour(inactiveColor);
00199 
00200         pt = getCategoryButton(mode);
00201         pt->setTextColour(activeColor);
00202         categoryMode = mode;
00203     }
00204 
00205     MyGUI::ButtonPtr getCategoryButton(CategoryMode mode)
00206     {
00207         return buttons[mode];
00208     }
00209 
00210     void onCategorySelected(MyGUI::Widget *widget)
00211     {
00212         boost::array<CategoryMode, 5> categories = { {
00213         CM_All, CM_Weapon, CM_Apparel, CM_Magic, CM_Misc
00214         } };
00215 
00216         for (int i = 0; i < categories.size(); ++i)
00217         {
00218             CategoryMode mode = categories[i];
00219             if (widget == buttons[mode])
00220             {
00221                 setCategory(mode);
00222                 return;
00223             }
00224         }
00225     }
00226 
00227     CategoryMode categoryMode;        // Current category filter
00228     MyGUI::ButtonPtr buttons[5];    // Button pointers
00229     std::string names[5];            // Names of category buttons
00230 
00231     MyGUI::Colour activeColor;
00232     MyGUI::Colour inactiveColor;
00233   };
